text: E'ina hu'negu amama mani'naza mopafintira tamazeri mate'vanugeta tamagehe'zane tamagranema keta antahita osu'naza moparega vugahaze. Anantega umani'neta hanine zagenena kaza osu havi anumzantamintera monora huzamantegahaze. Ana'ma nehanage'na Nagra nasunkura huramante'na tamazeri so'ea osugahue.
